name: NSViewInvalidating
desc: Implements a type of invalidation that can occur on a view that requires an update.

items.name: static var constraints: NSView.Invalidations.Constraints
items.desc: A change that invalidates a view’s constraints.

items.name: static var display: NSView.Invalidations.Display
items.desc: A change that requires the system to redraw a view’s content.

items.name: static var intrinsicContentSize: NSView.Invalidations.IntrinsicContentSize
items.desc: A change that invalidates a view’s intrinsic size.

items.name: static var layout: NSView.Invalidations.Layout
items.desc: A change that invalidates the layout of the containing view’s subviews.

items.name: static var restorableState: NSView.Invalidations.RestorableState
items.desc: A change that invalidates the restorable state of the view.

items.name: func invalidate(view: NSView)
items.desc: Indicates to the system that an aspect of a view is invalid and triggers the necessary update.

items.name: enum NSView.Invalidations
items.desc: Changes that cause aspects of a view to be invalid and require an update.
